title: Holiday Greeting + Discount Offer
description: For high-value customers, send greetings and discounts during holidays
template: Dear ${name}, Happy ${holidayName}! Thank you for spending over ${minSpend} dollars in the past. We are pleased to offer you an exclusive ${discount}% discount on our facelift services. Don't miss this opportunity, valid for two weeks only.

title: New Product Recommendation + Discount Offer for Loyal Customers
description: For loyal customers, recommend new products and offer discounts
template: Dear ${name}, we are excited to introduce our new ${productName} product, which is perfect for your ${beautyGoal}. As a loyal customer, you can enjoy a ${discount}% discount on your next purchase. This offer is valid for one month.

title: Repurchase Reminder + Discount Offer for Loyal Customers
description: For loyal customers, remind them to repurchase and offer discounts
template: Dear ${name}, we noticed that you enjoyed our ${lastProductName} product. As a token of our appreciation, we would like to offer you a ${discount}% discount on your next purchase. This offer is valid for one month.
